column4: it takes some getting used to, but once you get the hang of it, it's really not bad.... i chose to switch to xfce, rather than deal w/ unity any longer
arand, I guess it's like anything else, just going to take some getting used to. Is there anyway to add things to the panel?
i couldn't figure out how to, but you can create anothe rpanel, and add items to it... (i think).. and just set it to auto hide
arand, Ok, thanks for the help! I'm going to go play a little more. Ubuntu still ROCKS!!
